xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: MoccaCalendarMacroTranslations
xwikidoc.content: rendering.macro.moccacalendar.name=Mocca Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.description=Displays a Calendar rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.name=Show events from ... rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.filter.description=Possible values are 'wiki','space' or 'page', where: 'page': only events which are children pages of this page will be included, 'space': only events which are in the space of the calendar doc will be included, 'wiki': all events will be included. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.name=Calendar page rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.calendarDoc.description=The calendar document whose events are shown (only if filter is set to 'page'). This value is also used as the default calendar to create new events for. If missing, the current document is used. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.name=Default View rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.defaultView.description=The initial way the calendar is displayed; can be changed by the user. Possible values are: 'month', 'agendaWeek', 'agendaDay' or 'plainList' rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.name=First day of week rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.firstDay.description=First day (from 0 being Sunday to 6 being Monday) of the week to show in the calendar. Leave empty for Sunday. rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.name=First time rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.minTime.description=First time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours before this time. Leave empty for default (8:00) rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.name=Last time rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.maxTime.description=Last time to show in the calendar. Users won't see hours after this time. Leave empty for default (23:00) rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.name=Year rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.year.description=Year of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.name=Month rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.month.description=Month (from 0 to 11) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.name=Day rendering.macro.moccacalendar.parameter.date.description=Day (from 1 to 31) of the date to show when loading the calendar. Leave empty for today
